name: ThreeStories-TextAdv
description:
Outline: It's a Text-Adventure game mix Role-play game called ThreeStories. There are three different stories in this game, and the player can explore different world and communicate with different characters. 

Controll: Player can controll the character by keyboard- type the key words. /Press "ESC" for quit the game.

Things To Do: In this game, the player can talk to different NPC. Also, they can collect some items or go explore the world.
